message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small share, but know that it will be worth more to you than it is to me!
Alice, you were very generous in the last round. However, I believe I can do better this time.  Let's split the money almost evenly, with a slight advantage for me, given the inflation factor.
Bob, let's be fair this time.  We both get a decent amount, and we don't have to worry about inflation eating away at our gains any further.
